title: Queen of puddings
description: Mary Berry's step-by-step recipe for this retro British pudding of custard, cake and jam topped with soft, chewy meringue.You will need a 1.4L/2½pt oval ovenproof dish that will fit inside a roasting tin.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter, plus extra for greasing the dish
200g/7oz fresh mixed summer fruits, or 500g/1lb 2oz frozen. (Alternatively you can use raspberry jam if you prefer.)
